info.title: Changerawr API Documentation
info.description: The official documentation for the Changerawr API. rawr

get.description: subscribers for a project with pagination and search functionality

post.description: or updates a subscription for a user to receive email notifications for a project

endpoint only accepts POST requests for system configuration

400.description: Cannot delete own account or last admin

403.description: Unauthorized - Only admins can delete users

500.description: Failed to delete user

delete.description: deletes a user account by setting their references to NULL in related data. This preserves data integrity while removing the user from the system. Only admins can perform this action.

400.description: Invalid request data or cannot modify own role

403.description: Unauthorized - Only admins can update users

500.description: Failed to update user

patch.description: a user's name and/or role. Only admins can perform this action.

the details of an API key, including its name, last used date, created date, expiration date, revocation status, and permissions. Requires admin permissions.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

get.description: the details of a changelog entry by its ID, including its title, content, version, tags, and creation/update timestamps. Requires user authentication and permission to view the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to retrieve.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

put.description: the title, content, version, and tags of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

delete.description: a changelog entry if the user is an admin, or creates a deletion request if the user is staff. Requires user authentication and appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to delete.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

patch.description: the status (published/unpublished) of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.
